I am using my MockupDataSource class for this kind of testing, which 
implements only getConnection method from DataSource interface.

Here it is, in Files section of this group:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/MockupDataSource.java

Feel free to adjust it to your own needs. My example is using Oracle 
JDBC driver and System property to pass database url.
